name: Zombie Shmup
description:
You are an android who is trying to defend your precious humans from bloodthirsty zombies. However, you're stuck in a hallway with seemingly endless hordes of the undead making their way toward you. The only thing you can do now is shoot, and keep on shooting. 

CONTROLS:

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

SPACE - Shoot

Assets:

  • Shoot sound
  • Reload sound
  • Siren sound
  • Metal sound
  • Zombies sound
